pages.text: hum ne isi tarah is Qur’aan ko waazeh ayato mein utaara hai, jise Allah chaahe hidaayath naseeb farmaata hai
beshak ahle imaan aur yahoodi aur saabi aur nasraani aur majusi aur mushrikeen, in sab ke darmiyaan qayaamath ke din khud Allah ta’ala faisle kar dega, Allah ta’ala har har cheez par gawaah hai

kya tu nahi dekh raha ke, Allah ke saamne sajde mein hai sab asmaano waale aur sab zameeno waale aur suraj aur chaandh aur sitaare aur pahaad aur daraqth aur jaanwar aur bahuth se insaan bhi, haan bahuth se wo bhi hai jin par azaab ka maqula saabiath ho chuka hai, jise rab zaleel karde ose koyi izzath dene wala nahi, Allah jo chahta hai karta hai
ye duno apne rab ke baare mein eqtelaaf karne waale hai, pas kaafiro ke liye to aag ke kapde byonath kar kaate jayenge aur un ke saro ke upar se saqth khaulta hoa paani bahaya jayega
jis se un ke pet ki sab cheeze aur khaale gala di jayengi
aur un ki saza ke liye loohe ke hatode hai
ye jab bhi wahaan ke gham se nikal bhaagne ka iraada karenge, waheen lauta diye jayenge aur (kaha jayega) jalne ka azaab chako

imaan waalo aur nek kaam waalo ko Allah ta’ala un jannato mein le jayega, jin ke daraqto ta le se nehre lehre le rahi hai, jahaan wo sone ke kangan pehnaaye jayenge aur sacche moti bhi, wahaan un ka libaas qaalis resham hoga
